help: send a link and i'll download it
about: this is an instance of yotbot, yot stands for Youtube Over Telegram
dl: Please append a link . for example /dl@{botname} https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BX6KILafIS0
search: Please senda query togeather. for example /search hammerfall
vid_not_found: I didn't found any video for {query} :/
not_an_url: I think that was no link. :/ try /search
vid_to_long: Your video is to long. Our maximum video length is {limit} min
429: Youtube blocked me. Please try again in a few days
ytdl_problem: There was a problem downloading the Video.
file_to_big: File was to big. I'm sry :/
